nio/DynamicFields.description: A NIO block for enriching signals dynamically.  By default, the dynamic fields block adds attributes to existing signals as specified. If the `exclude` flag is set, the block instantiates new (generic) signals and passes them along with *only* the specified `fields`.

exclude.title: Exclude existing fields?
exclude.description: If `True`, output signals only contain the attributes specified by `fields`.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: List of attribute names and corresponding values to add to the incoming signals.

default.description: One signal for every incoming signal, modified according to `fields` and `exclude`.
